description: This file defines a custom React hook named useRecipes that manages the state and logic for searching recipes, including handling query input, loading state, and fetched recipe data.

methods.name: useRecipes(initialQuery = '')
methods.description: Custom React hook for managing recipe search, including query, recipes list, loading state, and search execution.

methods.name: performSearch
methods.description: Asynchronous function that triggers a search for recipes based on the query and updates the state accordingly.
